name: One Bullet (Aeerenthian)
description:
An arena shooter requiring fast twitch reactions. Shoot, dodge, and even catch bullets, but remember: You only have one. 

One Bullet is perfect for those who love high octane, non-stop, chaotic action.  You and another player are pitted against each other in a duel to the death, but… Both of you only have one bullet.

Bullets bounce and ricochet from wall to wall, platform to platform until they either meet their mark or you catch them.  Catching bullets is the only way to reload, and the only way to survive. 

One Bullet is a 2-Player game. It does not support single player.

Note

Map 1 - Yellow is the standard map. Map 2 - Green has the jump height cranked hysterically high. Play at your own risk ;-)

Install instructions

     Download the folder. Unzip the contents, then click on the executable file, "OneBullet_Unity2017."
